title: Module Quality Standards
description: Quality criteria for evaluating module pre-planning answers

criteria.description: How clear and specific is the module's purpose?
criteria.excellent: Purpose is crystal clear, specific, and directly addresses a business need
criteria.good: Purpose is clear with minor ambiguity
criteria.acceptable: Purpose is somewhat clear but could be more specific
criteria.needs_improvement: Purpose is vague or too broad

criteria.description: How well-defined is the module scope?
criteria.excellent: Scope is well-defined with 3-7 specific, achievable functionalities
criteria.good: Scope is mostly clear with minor gaps
criteria.acceptable: Scope is defined but may be too broad or narrow
criteria.needs_improvement: Scope is unclear or poorly defined
criteria.inadequate: Scope is missing or completely unclear

criteria.description: How well are the target users identified?
criteria.excellent: Users are clearly identified with roles and use cases
criteria.good: Users are well identified with minor gaps
criteria.acceptable: Users are identified but lack detail
criteria.inadequate: Users are not identified or unclear

criteria.description: How well are the data entities defined?
criteria.excellent: Data entities are comprehensive with key attributes and relationships
criteria.good: Data entities are well defined with minor gaps
criteria.acceptable: Data entities are defined but lack detail
criteria.inadequate: Data entities are missing or unclear

criteria.description: How well are performance requirements considered?
criteria.excellent: Performance requirements are specific and measurable
criteria.acceptable: Performance requirements are mentioned but vague

criteria.description: How well are security considerations addressed?
criteria.excellent: Comprehensive security considerations with specific measures
criteria.good: Good security considerations with minor gaps

criteria.description: How well are UI requirements planned?
criteria.excellent: UI requirements are detailed and user-focused
criteria.good: UI requirements are well planned with minor gaps
criteria.acceptable: UI requirements are basic but adequate
criteria.inadequate: UI requirements are missing or unclear

criteria.description: How well are success metrics defined?
criteria.excellent: Success metrics are specific, measurable, and relevant
criteria.acceptable: Success metrics are mentioned but could be more specific
criteria.inadequate: Success metrics are missing or unclear

recommendations.excellent: Excellent pre-planning! You're ready to proceed with detailed implementation planning.
recommendations.good: Good pre-planning with minor areas for improvement. Consider refining the highlighted areas before proceeding.
recommendations.acceptable: Acceptable pre-planning but several areas need more detail. Please address the feedback before creating the implementation plan.
recommendations.needs_improvement: The pre-planning needs significant improvement. Please revise your answers based on the feedback provided.
recommendations.inadequate: The pre-planning is inadequate. Please start over and provide more detailed, thoughtful answers.
